name: csa-c
description:
csa: Cubic Spline Approximation. csa is a C code for cubic spline
approximation of 2D scattered data. It provides a C library and a
command line utility csabathy.

dependent_to.name: elmerfem
dependent_to.description:
Elmer is an open source multiphysical simulation software. It includes
physical models of fluid dynamics, structural mechanics,
electromagnetics, heat transfer and acoustics.
